My current research interests primarily focus on applying Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Data Mining in domain-specific studies (e.g., Finance, Education, and Cognitive Science), hopefully in an interpretable manner. I am also exploring the possibility of enrolling in a Ph.D. program for the Fall of 2025. If there are any opportunities for collaboration, please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience.
